channel.title: Tech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Tech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Black Friday Deals Live 2025: We're Tracking Discounts, Trends, and More
item.description: Today is finally Black Friday, the biggest and best shopping day of the year. The WIRED Reviews team is tracking trends and discounts live.

item.title: 15 Best Black Friday Tech Deals (2025)
item.description: Behold the best Black Friday tech deals on WIRED-tested and approved gadgetry of all kinds.

item.title: Anduril’s autonomous weapons stumble in tests and combat, WSJ reports
item.description: Defense tech startup Anduril Industries has faced numerous setbacks during testing of its autonomous weapons systems, according to new reporting by th...

item.title: Our Favorite Unbound Merino Wool T-Shirts Are on Sale for Black Friday
item.description: WIRED’s pick for the best travel T-shirt is on sale for Black Friday. Expand your merino wardrobe with these deals. Hurry though, the sale ends tonigh...

item.title: How OpenAI and Google see AI changing go-to-market strategies
item.description: AI is changing how investors and startups bring their products to market. Three experts offered their insights at TechCrunch Disrupt.

item.title: The race to regulate AI has sparked a federal vs state showdown
item.description: The fight over AI regulation isn't about the technology -- it's about whether Washington or the states get to set the rules, and what happens to consu...

item.title: 9 Best Laptops (2025), WIRED-Tested and Approved
item.description: Our expert team of laptop testers stand behind these Windows laptops, MacBooks, Chromebooks, and Linux portables.

item.title: Best iPad apps to boost productivity and make your life easier
item.description: There are many iPad apps to help you organize recipes; sync tasks across devices; be more productive; and manage your notes.

item.title: The Best Deals From Huckberry’s 2025 Black Friday Sale
item.description: Huckberry’s Black Friday sale features deals on an eclectic curation of travel clothing, coffee gear, and lock-pick training kits (seriously).

item.title: This Thanksgiving’s real drama may be Michael Burry versus Nvidia
item.description: Is Burry the canary in the coal mine, warning of a collapse that's inevitable? Or could his fame, his track record, his now unrestricted voice, and a ...
